baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。不以房舍囑他。至聚落中。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 139

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼安居竟。不捨精舍還主去者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 98

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。僧房床褥不捨而去波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 115
